channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update February 2024
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, February 7th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024
item.description: The project’s live update was held the first time in 2024 and streamed live on January 17th, 2024.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update January 2024
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, January 17th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PSDevCon 2023: PrestaShop News - Where We Are And Where We’re Going
item.description: The PrestaShop Developer Conference happened on the 30th of November 2023. During the day, I was able to present a conference, titled “PrestaShop news - Where we are and where we’re going”. This blog post is a written version of the presentation that I also partially presented at the December Live Update on December 20th.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the tenth time this year and streamed live on December 20th, 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.3 Is Available
item.description: We are entering the new year with the release of PrestaShop 8.1.3. The latest update for PrestaShop 8.1 is now available. This version brings two security updates, addresses close to 30 known issues, and introduces various enhancements.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.11 Is Available
item.description: A security patch for PrestaShop 1.7 is now available.

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – November 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about coding, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in November 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Synopsis Of The Day
item.description: The European community of PrestaShop developers gathered to talk code, commerce and also open source in Paris, on November 30, 2023, at the PrestaShop Developer Conference. It was so exciting to see approximately 150 people come to follow conferences and other technical presentations, as well as network during the day.

item.title: New Branding For The Project
item.description: This week will see some changes with the Project. PrestaShop SA, the company, is making the open source Project consistent with the new PrestaShop branding.

item.title: Hooks in the Hummingbird theme
item.description: Hummingbird is the new theme set to be introduced in PrestaShop 9. This theme represents a complete overhaul of the Classic theme, featuring a fresh design and new functionalities. The Product Design team at PrestaShop has developed a visual guide to the hooks available in this theme, aimed at simplifying customization for front-end developers who want to work with it.

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The tenth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, December 20th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - November
item.description: November was marked by the first PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris.

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – October 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about coding, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in October 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Program and Registration
item.description: If you’re a PrestaShop developer or enthusiast looking to broaden your knowledge and connect with fellow community members, the PrestaShop Developer Conference is the event for you.
